alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:08PM CDT until June 14 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Dawson County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1107 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Elwood, or 22 miles southwest of Lexington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elwood around 1120 PM CDT. Smithfield around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bertrand and Overton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 233 and 253. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
